Dear Razan, 

 

I hope my email finds you well. 

 

I would like to report you about the incident took place in our external stock room. Mall management did floor grinding in LG floor next to our external fitting room. 

 

We found our stock room full of dust and with strong smell of the paint. The dust rested on cashmere coats, red carpet dresses and all other our stock that we kept after receiving the 

 

shipment.  Usually we put plastic covers on after the next days of the shipment. However, we could not put it on this time due to busy days and overnight VM change we had after 

 

receiving the delivery.

 As you are aware of our stock room is small and most of the items we keep only 1 size in our stock room other sizes we keep in the external stockroom.  

 

 Could we please request the mall management to inform us in the future if maintenance work takes place which will affect our stock in LG floor? At least we will install dust stopper

I would like to ask your approval  before proceeding cleaning the stock room and the stock and sending the items for dry cleaning (some items need to send to dry
